verbs.description: sounders [V: chad] [ARG1: marshall] [ARG2: out] [ARGM-PRP: for 2nd leg of conference semis] star seattle sounders defender chad marshall will miss the second leg of the mls western conference semifinals because of knee surgery coach brian schmetzer says the center back was having surgery tuesday to repair cartilage in his right knee there was no word on how long the anchor of seattle defense will be out marshall was hurt during seattle 2 - 1 loss to portland in the first leg sunday and was replaced in the 40th minute seattle sounders kim kee - hee cristian roldan roman torres wash román torres aaron long portland seattle brian schmetzer atlanta major league soccer chad marshall michael parkhurst tukwila portland oregon mls seattle sounders fc timbers new york red bulls sounders
